document.full_text: sidney crosby has been cleared to travel and practice with the pittsburgh penguins but he is not expected to play again this regular season, the nhl team said wednesday.
document.title: crosby cleared to travel and practice with penguins
lines_and_colors: sidney crosby has been cleared to travel and practice with the pittsburgh penguins but he is not expected to play again this regular season, the nhl team said wednesday.
